elements.text: You are at a bowling alley, and it's your turn to bowl. A friend stands up, joking that they are going to take your turn. As you speak up to stop them, your words come out unclear, and they look...

elements.name: Bowling Alley_Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
